posts.post_title: T206 lot 4 hof's all psa graded including cy young *SOLD*
posts.post_content:
Here is a nice group of Hall Of Famers that I believe is reasonably priced-all backs are nice as well-I really don't want to sell them but I have to raise cash for another deal-I am only selling as a lot-SOLD delivered through paypal/check/money order. Thanks for taking a look!

Joe
